title: Noise level tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to measure noise using your smartphone's microphone.

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open it locally.

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/Log.png) on the sidebar,

move the **print** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Log/print.png)
and put the components as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/noiselevel/log.png)

this is for displaying on console the noise intensity measured by your smartphone

Press ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Loops/Loops.png) on the sidebar,

move the **main-loop** ![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Loops/main-loop-component.png)
and put the components as in the image

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/noiselevel/main-loop.png)

this is for displaying on the console the noise intensity measured by your smartphone
